rankings.subtitle: Who's dominating? The data doesn't lie.
rankings.signInForMore: Sign in to see more rankings

seasons.subtitle: Relive the battles. Every matchup ranked by combined Atlas Score‚Äîsee which kingdoms brought the heat.
seasons.checkBackSoon: Score history is being calculated. Check back soon.
seasons.combinedPowerDesc: The sum of both kingdoms' Atlas Scores going into the matchup. Higher scores = more competitive battles between proven kingdoms. This is how legends are made.
seasons.scoreTimingDesc: Scores reflect each kingdom's Atlas Score before the battle began‚Äîbased on their track record up to that point. No hindsight, just raw pre-battle power.

compare.heroSubtitle: Put any kingdoms in the ring. Let the stats decide.
compare.freeAccountCompare: Create a free account to compare up to 2 kingdoms side-by-side.
compare.signInFor5: Sign in to compare up to 5 kingdoms
compare.linkFor5: Link your Kingshot account to compare up to 5 kingdoms
compare.pickMatchup: Pick your matchup. The numbers will tell the story.
compare.radarDescription: Direct visual comparison with overlapping metrics. Hover over datasets to highlight.
compare.enterAtLeast2: Please enter at least 2 kingdom numbers
compare.kingdomsNotFound: One or both kingdoms not found
compare.notEnoughKingdoms: Not enough kingdoms found. Please check the kingdom numbers and try again.
compare.loadFailed: Failed to load kingdom data. Please try again later.

tools.heroSubtitle: Your arsenal for Kingshot supremacy. Data-driven tools built by players, for players.
tools.dropSuggestions: We're building what the community needs. Drop your suggestions in Discord.
tools.botDesc: Bring kingdom intelligence directly to your Discord server. Look up kingdoms, compare matchups, and check rankings ‚Äî without leaving Discord.
tools.botTagline: Intel at your fingertips. No tab-switching.
tools.compareDesc: Put any kingdoms in the ring. Head-to-head stats, win rates, and Atlas Scores. Let the data crown the champion.
tools.compareTagline: Know your enemy. Choose your allies.
tools.rallyDesc: Time your rallies to land together. Set hit order, march times, and delay windows ‚Äî so your alliance strikes as one.
tools.appointmentDesc: Coordinate Castle Appointments for KvK Prep Phase. Collect player speedups & availability, then auto-assign optimal buff slots. Make every 30 minutes count.
tools.calcDesc: Resource planners, upgrade costs, speedup estimates. Math so you don't have to.
tools.giftDesc: Every active Kingshot gift code in one place. Copy codes and redeem them in-game ‚Äî never miss free rewards again.
tools.transferDesc: Find your next kingdom ‚Äî or find the right players. Browse listings, create a transfer profile, and apply directly. No more blind transfers.
tools.transferTagline: Real data. Real applications. Zero guesswork.

battlePlanner.heroSubtitle: The difference between a coordinated castle hit and wasted marches is timing. Get it right ‚Äî every time.
battlePlanner.trialNote: Free for everyone during the trial period. No account required.
battlePlanner.step1Desc: Enter each rally caller with their march times to the target building.
battlePlanner.step2Desc: Select King's Castle or any of the 4 Turrets. Choose simultaneous or staggered hits.
battlePlanner.step3Desc: The planner calculates exact delays. Copy the call order and share it with your alliance.
battlePlanner.featuresSubtitle: Every feature exists because rally callers asked for it.
battlePlanner.featSyncDesc: Calculate exact call delays so every rally lands on the same building within seconds of each other. No more counting on your fingers.
battlePlanner.featBuffDesc: Track active speed buffs per player with live countdown timers. The planner auto-switches between regular and buffed march times.
battlePlanner.featEstimateDesc: Only know one march time? Enter regular or buffed ‚Äî the planner estimates the other using the √ó1.55 ratio. No spreadsheets needed.
battlePlanner.featCounterDesc: Plan offensive and defensive rallies simultaneously. Run two independent queues with different timing strategies.
battlePlanner.featPresetsDesc: Save your entire roster ‚Äî allies and enemies ‚Äî with their march times. Load them instantly for the next battle. Zero repeated setup.
battlePlanner.featCopyDesc: Generate the exact call order and copy it to clipboard. Paste it in your alliance chat. Everyone knows when to march.
battlePlanner.problemTitle: The castle is burning. Your rallies land 30 seconds apart.
battlePlanner.problemDesc: You've got 5 rally callers. Different march times. Someone calls too early, someone too late. The enemy reinforces between hits. Sound familiar?
battlePlanner.solutionDesc: The Battle Planner accounts for the 5-minute rally fill time plus each player's individual march time, then tells you exactly who calls first and the precise delay between each call. Your rallies connect within a 1-second window. The enemy can't reinforce fast enough.
battlePlanner.supporterDesc: The Battle Planner is included with Atlas Supporter ‚Äî along with unlimited /multirally, the Supporter badge, exclusive Discord access, and more. Starting at $4.99/month.
battlePlanner.communityCreditSuffix: for rallying this idea into existence. Built by the community, for the community.
battlePlanner.supporterConfirm: You have full access as an Atlas Supporter.
battlePlanner.supporterThanks: You have full access to the Battle Planner.
battlePlanner.supporterThanksDesc: Thank you for supporting Atlas. Jump straight into the planner and coordinate your next castle hit.
battlePlanner.goldConfirm: You have full access as a Gold Tier kingdom member.
battlePlanner.goldDesc: The Battle Planner is available for Gold Tier kingdoms. Help your kingdom reach Gold by contributing to the Kingdom Fund on the Transfer Hub.
battlePlanner.goldPerk: Available for Gold Tier kingdoms. Contribute to the Kingdom Fund to unlock.
battlePlanner.goldThanks: You have full access to the Battle Planner.
battlePlanner.goldThanksDesc: Your kingdom has earned Gold Tier status. Jump straight into the planner and coordinate your next castle hit.

battlePlannerBanner.title: KvK Battle Planner is HERE
battlePlannerBanner.desc: Free access for everyone ‚Äî try it this weekend's Castle Battle. Coordinate rallies like never before.

about.transferHubDesc: Tired of asking "anyone know a good kingdom?" in Discord and getting 20 different answers? The
about.heroSubtitle: Know your enemy. Choose your allies. Dominate Kingshot.
about.featureDirectoryDesc: Every kingdom. Every stat. Searchable, filterable, and ranked. Find exactly what you're looking for in seconds.
about.featureScoreDesc: Battle-tested rating that rewards experience and consistency. One number tells you who's a real threat vs a lucky newcomer.
about.featureComparisonDesc: Pit any two kingdoms against each other. See who has the edge in Prep, Battle, and overall dominance.
about.featureHistoryDesc: Every match. Every result. Every streak. Know exactly what you're walking into before the gates open.
about.featureTiersDesc: S-Tier elites to D-Tier underdogs. Instantly identify where any kingdom stands in the pecking order.
about.atlasScoreTitle: The Atlas Score: Your Kingdom's True Power Level
about.tierSystemTitle: The Tier System: Where Does Your Kingdom Rank?
about.builtByPlayer: Built by a Player, For Players
about.transferHubTitle: The Transfer Hub: No More Blind Transfers
about.atlasScoreIntro: Stop guessing. Start winning. The Atlas Score measures what actually matters:
about.atlasScoreIntro2: Our formula rewards experience, punishes lucky streaks, and shows who really dominates. Here's the breakdown:
about.baseScoreDesc: Combined Prep (45%) + Battle (55%) win rates with Bayesian adjustment. No inflated scores from lucky starts.
about.domInvasionDesc: Dominations boost your score up to +15%. Invasions hurt equally. Rewards consistent double-phase performance.
about.recentFormDesc: Last 5 KvKs weighted by recency. Domination=1.0, Comeback=0.80, Reversal=0.70, Invasion=0.
about.streakBonusDesc: Current win streaks provide a boost. Battle: +1.1% per win (max 10). Prep: +1% per win (max 10).
about.bayesianAdjDesc: Pulls extreme rates toward 50% until you prove yourself
about.expScalingDesc: Full credit at 5+ KvKs‚Äîno shortcuts for newcomers
about.multiplierStackDesc: Dominations, form, and streaks compound your base score
about.realData: Real data. Real results. No spin. That's how you know who to fear and who to target.
about.tierSystemDesc: Every kingdom earns their tier through battle. No politics, no favoritism‚Äîjust cold, hard results.
about.originP1b: The founder got tired of making transfer decisions based on rumors and Discord hearsay. Tired of walking into KvK blind. Tired of guessing.
about.originP2: So he built the tool he wished existed: a place where every kingdom's track record is laid bare. Real data. Real results. No spin.
about.originP3: Today, Atlas is powered by the community‚Äîplayers contributing data, reporting results, and helping each other make smarter decisions. This isn't a corporate product. It's a passion project built by someone who plays the game and wants to see the community thrive.
about.finePrintDesc: Our data comes from community contributions and verified KvK results. We obsess over accuracy, but KvK is complex‚Äîedge cases exist. If you spot an error, let us know.
about.cosmosCredit: for compiling the original KvK History spreadsheet that made this project possible. Community effort at its finest.
about.disclaimer: Kingshot Atlas is an independent fan project. We're not affiliated with or endorsed by the developers of Kingshot. We're just players who love the game.
about.trademarkNotice: Kingshot is a trademark of Century Games. All game content and materials are trademarks and copyrights of Century Games and its licensors. Kingshot Atlas is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or approved by Century Games. All KvK data on this platform is community-sourced and user-submitted.
about.transferHubDesc2: puts real data behind the biggest decision in Kingshot.
about.forPlayersDesc: Browse every kingdom with Atlas Scores, KvK records, and community reviews. Create a Transfer Profile, apply directly, and track your applications. Match Scores show which kingdoms fit your playstyle.
about.forRecruitersDesc: Claim your kingdom, set up your listing with requirements and vibe tags, and review incoming applications. Fund your listing to unlock better visibility and features like invites and priority placement.
about.transferHubCTA: Real data. Real applications. No more guessing who's actually recruiting and who's worth joining.
about.fuelDesc: Servers cost money. Development takes time. If Atlas has helped you make better decisions, consider throwing some support our way. Every bit helps keep the lights on and new features coming.
about.fuelFooter: Buy us a coffee, fund a feature, or just say thanks ‚òï
about.joinCommunityDesc: Got intel to share? Found a bug? Want to argue about tier rankings? Jump into our Discord. We're always looking for contributors, testers, and fellow data nerds.

support.fundDevDesc: New features, better performance, more data‚Äîyour support makes it happen.
support.keepServersDesc: Hosting isn't free. Your support covers infrastructure costs.
support.communityFirstDesc: No corporate overlords. Just players helping players.
support.shapeFutureDesc: Supporters get early access and input on what we build next.
support.heroDesc: Atlas is a community project built by players, for players. Your support keeps the lights on and new features coming.
support.welcomeFamily: You're now an Atlas Supporter. Welcome to the family!
support.canceledMsg: No worries ‚Äî you can support anytime. We appreciate you being here!
support.getPerks: Badge, Battle Planner, unlimited bot commands, bulk gift code redeem ‚Äî and the satisfaction of funding the tools you actually use.
support.giveMore: Want to give more? You can increase your amount in the Stripe portal after subscribing.
support.oneTimeDesc: Prefer a one-time contribution? Buy us a coffee on Ko-fi. Every bit helps keep the servers running.
support.oneTimeNote: Note: One-time donations don't include the Supporter badge or Discord role.
support.smallThankYou: A small thank you for helping us grow
support.freeForever: Atlas is built for the community. These features are free forever.
support.comingSoonRecruiter: More ways to support Atlas ‚Äî coming soon
support.cantDonate: Not everyone can donate, and that's totally fine! Here's how you can still help:
support.perk3Desc: Full access to the Rally Coordinator ‚Äî plan rallies, track marches, coordinate hits
support.perk4Desc: Unlimited /multirally and premium Discord bot commands (free: 5/day)
support.perk5Desc: Access to supporter-only discussions and early previews
support.perk6Desc: First to try new features before public release
support.free1Desc: Every match, every result, every kingdom
support.free4Desc: Project future scores based on outcomes
support.perk8Desc: Redeem gift codes for all your alt accounts at once ‚Äî one click
support.perk10Desc: Your command center. Configure reminders, gift code alerts, and manage multiple servers ‚Äî all from one screen.

changelog.heroSubtitle: Track every update. Know what's new. Stay ahead.
changelog.joinDiscordDesc: Join our Discord to get patch notes delivered automatically.

atlasBot.heroSubtitle: Kingdom intelligence, delivered straight to your Discord server. No tab-switching. No delays. Just data.
atlasBot.oneSlashAway: Everything you need, one slash away.
atlasBot.tacticalTools: Tactical tools built for players who coordinate to win.
atlasBot.supportersUnlimited: Atlas Supporters get unlimited access ‚Äî every rally, every KvK.
atlasBot.playersUseBot: Kingshot players across dozens of servers use Atlas Bot to scout opponents, compare kingdoms, and plan transfers ‚Äî without leaving Discord.
atlasBot.dashboardSubtitle: Your server, your rules. Configure everything from one place.
atlasBot.dashGiftCodesDesc: New codes drop ‚Äî your server knows instantly. Auto-posted to your channel with optional role pings.
atlasBot.dashEventRemindersDesc: Bear Hunt, Viking Vengeance, Swordland Showdown, Tri-Alliance Clash ‚Äî timed reminders so nobody misses the fight.
atlasBot.dashMultiServerDesc: Run multiple Discord servers? Switch between them seamlessly. One dashboard, all your setups.
atlasBot.dashAccessControlDesc: Block specific users from your dashboard. Only the right people manage your server's bot config.
atlasBot.dashSupporterNote: Available to Atlas Supporters. Invite the bot first, then configure from here.

accountSwitcher.verifyWhy: This prevents players from falsely claiming others' accounts.
accountSwitcher.verifyInstructions: To prove you own this account, temporarily add this code anywhere in your in-game name:
accountSwitcher.verifyNote: Example: "{{name}} {{code}}" ‚Äî you can remove it after verification.
accountSwitcher.codeNotFound: Code "{{code}}" not found in your in-game name. Change your name to include it, wait a moment, then try again.

entry.title: What brings you here?
entry.subtitle: This helps us personalize your experience
entry.transferring: I'm looking for a new kingdom
entry.transferringDesc: Create your Transfer Profile and apply to kingdoms
entry.recruitingDesc: Manage your kingdom listing and review applications
entry.browsingDesc: Explore kingdoms and see what's available
entry.savedOnDevice: Your choice is saved on this device. You can switch modes anytime.

guide.title: How the Transfer Hub Works
guide.intro: No more blind transfers. Here's everything you need in 60 seconds.
guide.tipRecruit: The better your Transfer Profile, the higher your Match Score with kingdoms. Fill it out completely ‚Äî recruiters notice.
guide.tipRecruiter: Kingdoms with active funds rank higher in listings. Even a Bronze tier gets you noticed over Standard listings.

recruit.step1Desc: Select "I'm Transferring" from the toggle at the top. This unlocks tools built for you.
recruit.step2Desc: Set your power, TC level, language, and what you're looking for. Kingdoms see this when you apply.
recruit.step3Desc: Every kingdom has an Atlas Score, KvK record, and community reviews. Use filters to narrow it down. Match Scores show how well you fit.
recruit.step4Desc: Found the right one? Hit Apply. You can have up to 3 active applications. Track their status in My Applications.

recruiter.step1Desc: Switch to "I'm Recruiting" and claim editor rights. You need endorsements from kingdom members to activate.
recruiter.step2Desc: Open the Recruiter Dashboard. Add your pitch, requirements, languages, vibe tags, and event times. This is your kingdom's storefront.
recruiter.step3Desc: Contributing to your Kingdom Fund unlocks Bronze ‚Üí Silver ‚Üí Gold tiers with better visibility and features. Funds deplete ~$5/week.
recruiter.step4Desc: Applicants land in your inbox. View their profiles, mark as Interested, Accept, or Decline. The right players come to you.

transferHub.groupsOutdated: These groups are from the last Transfer Event and may change before the next one.

error.description: Something went wrong loading the Transfer Hub.
error.title: Error Loading Transfer Hub

transferHub.nominationCancelledDesc: Your co-editor nomination has been cancelled.

listing.fundDescription: Kingdoms fund their listing to unlock better visibility and features.
listing.matchBreakdownDesc: How well this kingdom fits your Transfer Profile preferences.
listing.matchBasedOn: Based on your Transfer Profile preferences vs this kingdom's listing.
listing.leadingDesc: 20 regular invites, 10 open slots, lower power cap
listing.ordinaryDesc: 35 regular invites, up to 3 special invites, 20 open slots, higher power cap
listing.atlasScoreTooltip: Comprehensive rating based on win rates, performance patterns, recent form, and experience. Rewards consistency over lucky streaks.
listing.vibeNotSet: Not set ‚Äî editors can add vibes in the Recruiter Dashboard
listing.bioNotSet: Not set ‚Äî add a bio in the Recruiter Dashboard (max 150 chars)
listing.upgradeForBio: Upgrade to Silver to add a kingdom bio
listing.fundedListingsPromo: ‚ú® Funded listings get shimmer borders, glow effects & more visibility

editor.becomeEditorDesc: Become the editor for your kingdom's Transfer Hub listing. As editor, you control recruitment settings, review applications, and manage your kingdom's public profile.
editor.endorsementsRequired: 10 endorsements from TC20+ kingdom members (after nomination)

rallyCoordinator.title: KvK BATTLE
rallyCoordinator.subtitle: Synchronized destruction. No guesswork.
rallyCoordinator.comingSoonDesc: Coordinate multi-rally strikes with surgical precision. Set march times, call orders, and hit windows ‚Äî so your alliance lands together, every time. Currently in development.
rallyCoordinator.marchTimesHelp: March times in seconds (0‚Äì120). Enter one ‚Äî the other is estimated automatically.
rallyCoordinator.marchTimesEstimate: ‚âà = estimated (√ó1.55 ratio). Enter both to use exact values.
rallyCoordinator.dropToAdd: Drop players here or click to add
rallyCoordinator.addToRallyQueue: Add 2+ players to Rally Queue to generate call order
rallyCoordinator.rallyTimelineEmpty: Rally timeline appears here once you queue 2+ players
rallyCoordinator.addToCounterQueue: Add players to Counter Queue to generate counter timing
rallyCoordinator.counterTimelineEmpty: Counter timeline appears when you have players queued
rallyCoordinator.slowMarchWarning: Some players have march times over 100s ‚Äî double-check those values.
rallyCoordinator.noPresetsYet: No presets yet. Build a rally and save it here for instant recall.
rallyCoordinator.addPlayersEmpty: Add your rally leaders. No guesswork.
rallyCoordinator.emptyPlayersGuide: Start by adding allies and enemies with their march times. Then drag them into the Rally or Counter queue.
rallyCoordinator.emptyStep1: Click + Add Ally or + Add Enemy above
rallyCoordinator.emptyStep2: Enter player name and march times
rallyCoordinator.emptyStep3: Drag players to Rally or Counter queue
rallyCoordinator.playersHintDesktop: Allies ‚Üí Rally Queue. Enemies ‚Üí Counter Queue. Right-click to edit.
rallyCoordinator.playersHintMobile: Allies ‚Üí Rally Queue. Enemies ‚Üí Counter Queue. Long-press to edit.
rallyCoordinator.buffResetWarning: The 2-hour buff timer will be reset.
rallyCoordinator.howToStep1: Add your rally leaders ‚Äî allies and enemies.
rallyCoordinator.howToStep2: Set their march times for each building.
rallyCoordinator.howToStep3: Click or drag players into the Rally Queue.
rallyCoordinator.howToStep4: Set the hit order ‚Äî who lands first matters.
rallyCoordinator.howToStep5: Do the same for the Counter Queue if needed.
rallyCoordinator.howToStep6: Activate pet buff timers when applicable.
rallyCoordinator.accessDeniedDesc: You need Gold Tier access to use the Rally Coordinator.

missingData.subtitle: Missing data means blind spots. Fill the gaps and help every player make smarter decisions.
missingData.signInDesc: Link your account to submit KvK results and earn contributor status.
missingData.linkDesc: Connect your kingdom to unlock submissions and track your contributions.
missingData.addNewKingdomDesc: Submit a new kingdom not yet tracked in the Atlas. Select their first KvK to determine relevant history.

missingData.noFirstKvk: Has not had first KvK yet
missingData.noKvkNote: This kingdom will be added with no KvK history. Once they participate in a KvK, you can submit their results.
missingData.addKvkHint: Click "+ Add KvK" to add results starting from KvK #{{kvk}}
missingData.reviewNote: Submissions are reviewed by admins before being added to the Atlas.

giftCodes.aboutCodesDesc: Gift codes are released by Century Games through social media, events, and partnerships. Atlas aggregates them so you never miss one.

transferHubLanding.pageTitle: Transfer Hub ‚Äî Find Your Next Kingdom
transferHubLanding.heroSubtitle: Stop asking around in Discord. Find the right kingdom ‚Äî or the right players ‚Äî with real data. 100% free.
transferHubLanding.freeNote: Free for all players. Link your Kingshot account to get started.
transferHubLanding.threeSteps: Three steps. Whether you're moving or recruiting.
transferHubLanding.step1Desc: Sign in and link your Kingshot Player ID. Takes 30 seconds.
transferHubLanding.step2Desc: Transferring? Browse listings. Recruiting? Claim your kingdom and set up your page.
transferHubLanding.step3Desc: Apply to kingdoms, review applications, and make moves ‚Äî all backed by real data.
transferHubLanding.forPlayersSubtitle: Find where you belong ‚Äî backed by data, not rumors.
transferHubLanding.tfFeat1Desc: See which kingdoms are actively recruiting ‚Äî with Atlas Scores, KvK records, and community reviews. No more guessing.
transferHubLanding.tfFeat2Desc: List your stats, playstyle, and what you're looking for. Recruiters find you ‚Äî no cold-calling required.
transferHubLanding.tfFeat3Desc: Every kingdom gets a match percentage based on your profile. Sort by best fit, apply to your top picks, and track your applications.
transferHubLanding.forRecruitersSubtitle: Stop cold-calling in transfer chat. Let the right players come to you.
transferHubLanding.rcFeat1Desc: Claim your kingdom, set requirements, add vibe tags, and describe what makes your kingdom worth joining. Your listing is always live.
transferHubLanding.rcFeat2Desc: Qualified players apply directly. Review their profiles, stats, and playstyle ‚Äî then accept or pass. No more spamming transfer chat.
transferHubLanding.rcFeat3Desc: Optionally deposit into your kingdom's fund to unlock priority placement, invite features, and a premium badge. Anyone in your kingdom can contribute.
transferHubLanding.fundDesc: Recruiting is a team effort. Anyone in your kingdom can chip in to boost the listing. Funds deplete slowly over time, so active kingdoms stay on top.
transferHubLanding.standardPerk1: Basic listing with Atlas Score & stats
transferHubLanding.fundNote: Depositing is 100% optional. The Transfer Hub is free for everyone. Fund tiers just give your kingdom extra visibility.
transferHubLanding.fundTeamwork: Ask your alliance to chip in ‚Äî recruiting benefits everyone in the kingdom.
transferHubLanding.problemTitle: Transfer chat is a mess. You know it.
transferHubLanding.problemDesc: Hundreds of messages. Half of them aren't serious. No way to compare kingdoms side by side. No way to know which recruiters are legit. You end up asking in Discord and getting 20 different opinions.
transferHubLanding.solutionDesc: The Transfer Hub replaces all of that. Every recruiting kingdom has real stats, an Atlas Score, KvK history, and community reviews. Players create profiles with their own stats and preferences. Apply directly. Track your applications. Done.
transferHubLanding.punchline: Real data. Real applications. No more blind migrations.
transferHubLanding.ctaDesc: Whether you're looking for a new home or looking for strong players ‚Äî the Transfer Hub connects you with the right match. No cost, no catch.
transferHubLanding.cmpBadge: Gilded badge for all kingdom users
transferHubLanding.cmpBasicListing: Basic listing with Atlas Score & stats
transferHubLanding.fundSubtitle: Recruiting is a team effort. Anyone in your kingdom can chip in to boost the listing.

kingdomCommunities.title: Kingdom Colonies
kingdomCommunities.heroSubtitle: The most active kingdoms on Atlas. Bigger colony = stronger intelligence.
kingdomCommunities.ctaTitle: Rally your kingdom to climb the ranks
kingdomCommunities.ctaDescription: Every linked player with TC20+ counts toward your kingdom's colony rank. Invite your alliance ‚Äî the bigger your presence, the stronger your kingdom's Atlas intelligence.
kingdomCommunities.footer: Only players who have linked their Kingshot account with TC20+ are counted. Rankings update in real-time.

prepScheduler.signInToAccess: Sign in to access the KvK Prep Scheduler.
prepScheduler.linkAccountToAccess: Link your Kingshot account in your profile settings to use the Prep Scheduler.
prepScheduler.title: KvK Prep Scheduler
prepScheduler.tagline: Coordinate your kingdom's prep day assignments
prepScheduler.noSchedules: No schedules yet. Create one above!
prepScheduler.formClosedDesc: This schedule's form is currently closed by the manager.
prepScheduler.lockedDesc: This schedule has been locked in. Assignments are finalized.
prepScheduler.nonQualifyingDesc: Your speedups don't meet the minimum threshold for any prep day. Your submission is saved but you may be placed on the waitlist.
prepScheduler.searchPlaceholder: Search by username or player ID...
prepScheduler.noManagers: No managers assigned yet. Search and add Prep Managers above.
prepScheduler.waitlistDesc: These players have availability but weren't assigned a slot. You can manually assign them using the dropdowns below.
prepScheduler.toastGoldOnly: Only Gold Tier kingdoms can use the KvK Prep Scheduler.
prepScheduler.confirmCloseForm: Close the form? No new submissions or edits will be allowed.
prepScheduler.confirmLock: Lock the schedule? This marks it as finalized.
prepScheduler.confirmArchive: Archive this schedule? It will no longer accept submissions.
prepScheduler.toastChangeRequestSent: Change request submitted! Your Prep Manager will be notified.
prepScheduler.toastAvailabilityRequired: Please add availability for at least one day, or mark all days as skipped.
prepScheduler.toastSubmissionReceived: Submission received! Your Prep Manager will assign you a slot.
prepScheduler.toastLinkCopied: Link copied! Share it with your kingdom players.
prepScheduler.toastInvalidImage: Please upload a JPEG, PNG, GIF, or WebP image.
prepScheduler.toastDuplicateSchedule: An active schedule already exists for this kingdom{{kvk}}. Close or archive it first.
prepScheduler.noSchedulesGold: Create your first Prep Schedule above to coordinate Castle Appointments for your kingdom.
prepScheduler.noSchedulesGeneral: When your kingdom has an active Prep Schedule, it will appear here. Ask your Prep Manager to share the form link with you.
prepScheduler.noSlotsAssigned: No slots assigned yet. Use Auto-Assign or expand to assign manually.
prepScheduler.toastRoleRequired: Only Editors, Co-Editors, and Prep Managers can create schedules.
prepScheduler.toastDeleteOnlyArchived: Only archived schedules can be deleted.
prepScheduler.confirmDelete: Permanently delete this archived schedule? All submissions, assignments, and change requests will be removed. This cannot be undone.
prepScheduler.toastUnauthorizedDeleted: This schedule was created by an unauthorized user and has been removed.
prepScheduler.toastScheduleFlagged: This schedule was created by an unauthorized user and has been flagged for admin review.
prepScheduler.noPermissionBanner: Only Editors, Co-Editors, and Prep Managers can create schedules. Ask your kingdom leadership for access.
prepScheduler.createScheduleDesc: Create a Prep Schedule for your Gold Tier kingdom. You'll get a shareable link for players to submit their availability and speedups.
prepScheduler.goldTierRequiredDesc: The KvK Prep Scheduler is available for Gold Tier kingdoms. Encourage your kingdom to reach Gold tier through the Kingdom Fund to unlock this tool!
prepScheduler.activeScheduleDesc: Your kingdom has an active prep schedule.
prepScheduler.beOnline: Be online during your assigned slot
prepScheduler.dontNeedBuff: I don't need a buff slot
prepScheduler.linkDesc: Share this link with your kingdom members
prepScheduler.linkReturnHint: Players will return here after submitting
prepScheduler.notAssignedDesc: You haven't been assigned a slot yet.
prepScheduler.notGoldTier: Your kingdom needs Gold Tier to use the Prep Scheduler.
prepScheduler.screenshotDesc: Upload a screenshot of your speedups
prepScheduler.signInDesc: Sign in to submit your prep availability
prepScheduler.speedupsDesc: How many speedups do you have?
prepScheduler.subtitle: Coordinate your kingdom's KvK prep phase
prepScheduler.timezoneHint: Times shown in your local timezone

prepLanding.featAutoAssignDesc: Players submit their availability and speedups. The system auto-assigns 30-minute buff slots based on who brings the most value. No spreadsheets, no guesswork.
prepLanding.featSpeedupsDesc: The algorithm prioritizes players with the highest relevant speedups for each day's buff type ‚Äî Construction, Research, or Training. Every minute counts.
prepLanding.featExportDesc: Export the full 3-day schedule as a CSV. Player names, alliances, slot times, and speedup data ‚Äî ready for Discord or in-game chat.
prepLanding.featProofDesc: Players upload a screenshot of their speedup inventory when submitting. Managers can verify claims before assigning slots. Trust, but verify.
prepLanding.featShareLinkDesc: Share one link with your kingdom. Players see only the submission form ‚Äî clean, simple, no confusion. They fill it out, you manage the schedule.
prepLanding.featConflictDesc: Unassigned players are flagged instantly. Availability gaps are highlighted. The manager sees exactly where the schedule needs attention ‚Äî no one gets lost.
prepLanding.step1Desc: An Editor, Co-Editor, or Prep Manager creates a Prep Schedule for their Gold Tier kingdom and sets an optional submission deadline.
prepLanding.step2Desc: Share the form link with kingdom players. They submit their speedups, availability, and proof screenshots.
prepLanding.step3Desc: One click auto-assigns optimal slots. Review, adjust if needed, then export the schedule and share it with your kingdom.
prepLanding.heroSubtitle: Your Gold Tier kingdom earned elite tools. Stop losing Prep Phase points to disorganized buff scheduling ‚Äî Atlas turns chaos into a precision-timed machine that maximizes every 30-minute slot.
prepLanding.goldTierNote: Reach Gold Tier through the Kingdom Fund to unlock this and other premium kingdom tools.
prepLanding.ctaNote: Editors, Co-Editors, and Prep Managers of Gold Tier kingdoms can create and manage schedules.
prepLanding.featuresSubtitle: Every feature exists because managing prep phase scheduling was a nightmare. Until now.
prepLanding.problemTitle: Your kingdom has 200 players. 48 buff slots per day. Do the math.
prepLanding.problemP1: Right now, your Prep Manager is probably juggling a Google Sheet, a Discord thread that's 500 messages deep, and a headache. Players post their availability in different time zones. Nobody knows who has the best speedups. Half the slots go to people who don't even show up.
prepLanding.problemP2: The KvK Prep Scheduler collects everything in one form ‚Äî speedups, availability, proof screenshots ‚Äî with a submission deadline shown in 24-hour UTC (and your local time). Then it auto-assigns slots based on who brings the most value for each day's buff type. Construction Monday? The system knows who has the most construction speedups and puts them in the best slots. Research Tuesday? Same logic, different data.
prepLanding.problemP3: Unassigned players get flagged immediately. Empty time slots are highlighted. The manager sees exactly where the gaps are and can manually assign anyone into any slot with override.
prepLanding.punchline: That's not scheduling. That's strategic resource allocation.
prepLanding.whoEditorsDesc: Create schedules for their kingdom. Assign Prep Managers to run the process. Full control over the schedule lifecycle.
prepLanding.whoPrepManagersDesc: Assigned by Editors to run the day-to-day. Review submissions, auto-assign slots, export schedules, handle change requests.
prepLanding.whoPlayersDesc: Fill out the form. Submit speedups, availability, and proof. Get assigned a 30-minute slot. Show up and buff.
prepLanding.ctaDesc: Your kingdom's Prep Phase doesn't have to be chaos. The Scheduler turns it into a streamlined, data-driven process.
prepLanding.goldDesc: The Prep Scheduler is available for Gold Tier kingdoms.
prepLanding.whoManagersDesc: Assigned by Editors to run the day-to-day. Review submissions, auto-assign slots, export schedules, handle change requests.
